name: 3Di_Heavy_Cruiser_Demo
description:
To make it come alive, put on the Perspectacles glasses.  For best results use full screen mode. 

Use the mouse to change the view.

If it stops working reload the page.

For best results sit 2.5 to 6 feet from the screen as the Perspectacles need to fall within the webcam's viewing angle.

Perspectacles turn your screen into a holographic display!
